text: Pierre Richard (born Pierre Richard Maurice Charles Léopold Defays (born 16 August 1934) is a popular French actor and comedian. He is known for playing a clumsy daydreamer in French comedy movies.Le bonheur de Pierre (in French) He worked with many famous French directors such as Louis de Funès and Gérard Depardieu.
